```{r load_lib, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(gapminder)
library(tibble)
library(DT)

```

## Print out gapminder data:

```{r print_gapm, echo=FALSE}

gapminder

```


## Convert mtcars to a tibble and wrap in datatable:

```{r mtcars_tibble, echo=FALSE}

#this is an R comment

DT::datatable( tibble::as_tibble(mtcars) )

```

## There are this many rows in the mtcars dataset:

```{r nrow_mtc, echo=FALSE}

nrow(mtcars)

```
